paper_abstract: We derive in this paper a new Local Rademacher Complexity risk bound on the generalization ability of a model, which is able to take advantage of the availability of unlabeled samples. Moreover, this new bound improves state-of-the-art results even when no unlabeled samples are available. (C) 2015 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Local Rademacher Complexity: Sharper risk bounds with and without unlabeled samples
